page.title: 18SPRINGHEAD NURSERIES
page.content: Springhead Nurseries is on the site a Roman Town, which much later became water-cress beds. It has been a nursery for about 100 years. In the 7 hectares of nursery there are 9 greenhouses,each holding approximately 18,000 to 20,000 plants. These are protected from ground pests with polythene, and a pesticide is used.Greenhouse temperatures are closely controlled. Marigolds & Begonias are the most popular. 200 to 300 of each plant are sold each year. Shrubs are also sold. Annually customers include half a million personal callers & retailers. Although the nurseries are open all year, the busiest period is May. Springhead Nurseries are managed by one man. Between 3 to 6 people are employed. Open daily 8 hours except on Christmas Day.Nurseries cover 17acres.
